titleStmt.title: The triumph of faith The sacrifice of Isaac. The ship-wracke of Ionas. With a song of the victorie obtained by the French king, at Yvry. Written in French, by W. Salustius lord of Bartas, and translated by Iosuah Siluester, marchant aduenturer.
Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Yardley, and Peter Short, and are to be sold at the Starre on Bredstreet hill,

notesStmt.note: "The sacrifice of Isaac" (caption title) has separate pagination and register. "A canticle of the victorie obteined by the French king, Henrie the fourth. at Yvry" is a reissue of STC 21669.
"Canticle" identifed as STC 21669 on UMI microfilm reel 469.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 469 ("Canticle" only) and at reel 551 (all but "Canticle").
